objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor surface covering the entire classroom area measuring ten meters by eight meters. It has a smooth finish with a light earth-tone color and subtle texture to simulate polished concrete or laminate. It is designed to be durable and easy to clean, complementing the dinosaur-themed décor.
A smooth painted wall in a neutral beige color, three meters high and ten meters wide, providing a clean backdrop for educational displays and equipment.
A smooth painted wall in a neutral beige color, three meters high and ten meters wide, ideal for additional decorations or storage.
A smooth painted wall in a neutral beige color, three meters high and eight meters wide, perfect for murals and displays.
A smooth painted wall in a neutral beige color, three meters high and eight meters wide, providing space for charts and educational posters.

A large wall-mounted rectangular blackboard with a matte dark green writing surface and a slim metal frame. Beneath the board is a chalk tray that spans its entire width. The board measures approximately eight meters wide and two meters high, providing ample space for writing and diagrams.

A larger teacher’s desk made from solid wood with a darker wood-tone finish. It features a spacious rectangular tabletop measuring approximately 1.6 meters by 0.8 meters, sturdy legs, and a smooth finish. The desk includes a built-in drawer unit on one side and enough space for teaching materials and interactive tools.

children.specification: An ergonomic teacher’s chair with adjustable height, cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in dark earth-tone fabric. The chair has a five-star caster base for mobility and supports comfortable seating during lessons.
A tabletop globe with a wooden stand, featuring a detailed world map texture. The sphere rotates smoothly and is rendered in vibrant colors with an antique-inspired brass finish on the axis.
A fossil excavation kit with brushes, chisels, and a sediment block, neatly contained in a plastic tray. The kit has realistic textures for tools and sediment, inviting interactive exploration.

objects.specification: A large, realistic replica of a dinosaur skeleton, meticulously assembled with detailed bone textures. The skeleton is mounted on a sturdy display stand. The off-white bones contrast against the background, offering an educational and striking exhibit.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a medium wood-tone finish, filled with dinosaur-related hardcover books. The shelves are evenly spaced, and the book spines display vibrant colors, adding to the thematic decor.

A long wooden display shelf in a warm wood tone, mounted to the wall, showcasing a variety of dinosaur toy models and figurines. The toys are arranged neatly in different sizes and vibrant colors, creating an engaging display.

A modern digital projector with a sleek white casing, mounted flush to the ceiling. It features a central lens, ventilation grilles on the sides, and cable ports on the back. The projector is angled to project directly onto the blackboard.
A vibrant wall mural depicting a Triceratops in mid-stride, painted directly onto the wall with bright colors and fine detail.
A vibrant poster of a T-Rex roaring, printed on a mounted canvas with a deep green border and high-resolution dinosaur artwork.
A colorful poster showing a Stegosaurus grazing among ferns, laminated and mounted on the west wall.
An educational poster featuring various dinosaur species with their names and silhouettes, presented in bright, contrasting colors.
A large round wall clock with a smooth black frame, white face, bold black numerals, and slender black hands. The clock is easy to read from anywhere in the room.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a ceramic pot with neutral glaze. Adds a touch of nature and freshness to the classroom corner.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a ceramic pot with neutral glaze. Adds a touch of nature and freshness to the classroom corner.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a ceramic pot with neutral glaze. Adds a touch of nature and freshness to the classroom corner.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a ceramic pot with neutral glaze. Adds a touch of nature and freshness to the classroom corner.

A standard individual student desk with a rectangular wooden tabletop and slender metal legs. The surface has a warm wood-tone finish, measuring approximately 0.8 meters in width and 0.6 meters in depth, with a modesty panel at the front edge. The desk is designed to accommodate one student and provide ample workspace while maintaining a sturdy and durable structure.

children.specification: A student chair featuring a metal tubular frame and a molded plastic seat and backrest in an earth-tone color. The chair has four legs, a slight recline for comfort, and is sized to fit neatly under the student desk, ensuring ergonomic seating for school-aged children.
